name: Bench Press
instruction: A compound exercise that targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps. Performed using a barbell or dumbbells on a flat bench.

name: Squat
instruction: A fundamental lower-body exercise that strengthens the quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes.

name: Deadlift
instruction: A full-body movement that primarily targets the lower back, hamstrings, and glutes.

name: Pull-Up
instruction: A bodyweight exercise that targets the upper back and biceps by pulling up to a bar.

name: Shoulder Press
instruction: A pressing movement that strengthens the deltoids and triceps by pushing a weight overhead.

name: Bicep Curl
instruction: An isolation exercise that targets the biceps by curling a dumbbell toward the shoulders.

name: Tricep Dips
instruction: A bodyweight exercise that targets the triceps by lowering and raising the body using parallel bars.

name: Lunges
instruction: A unilateral leg exercise that improves balance and strength.

name: Plank
instruction: An isometric core exercise that strengthens the abs, lower back, and shoulders.

name: Russian Twists
instruction: A rotational core exercise that targets the obliques.
